website_summaries.verdict: Customers wanting quality outdoor club chairs will be impressed with this stylish set of chairs.
pros: Lean back for a comfortable sitting position
cons: Cushions are not waterproof, and are a little stiff when first delivered

customer_reviews.title: Really nice set of outdoor lounge chairs
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set of outdoor lounge chairs! Great build quality, very helpful instructions, very easy to assemble. Comfortable to sit in and they look great on the patio. Will definitely order more when they become available.
customer_reviews.author: heff

customer_reviews.title: They are deep and lean back nicely the way a chair should
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are first class. The cushions are firm and the chairs sit very well. They are deep and lean back nicely the way a chair should. They are a bit lower than chairs at a table, but that is perfect for lounge chairs. The arms are long and very nicely positioned. I just wish they offered other colors for the cushions. Assembly was easy. I glued all the joints when I screwed them together, just for better durability. Very nice and smooth wood. Highly recommend these chairs. I am 6'2" tall and 180lbs and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Leftwich

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets of these for our firepit area. The acacia wood is sturdy. One recommendation to the company is to have longer screws to secure the seat panel. They need to be 1-1/2" screws, not the 1-1/4" included. We made a trip to the hardware store for screws for the last chair. It's the sturdiest chair of all 4 of them. We may be heading back to "fix" the other 3 chairs, too. Pads are nice and thick.
customer_reviews.author: mathbrain

customer_reviews.title: Great value, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: The chairs were fairly easy to assemble with one exception, on one of the chairs I had to drill 2 holes since the factory holes did not match up, simple fix. I rubbed the wood with teak oil b-4 I assembled them and they look fantastic. So far I am very pleased and I have got a lot of compliments. If I had the room, I would buy 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: cpoatlast

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: GDF Studio Preston 4pc Wood Patio Set - Comfortable and pretty patio furniture at a good price. My brother came over and remarked at how much I must have spent on the new furniture. He was amazed it didn’t cost what he thought. Light rain beads up on cushions instead of soaking in. My dogs got muddy footprints on the cushions and a wet rag easily cleaned it. I love the wide chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Janine M

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got these chairs to use in a seating area off of my living room. I love they way they look, and the neutral colors of the wood and cushions made it easy to decorate with.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Solid chairs
customer_reviews.text: Really solid chairs, not too hard to put together (be patient and follow the instructions) and they look great. The only complaint is that the cushions, despite their bulk, aren't super comfy - more on the firm side. Fine for a short sit, not great for reading with your feet up for hours.
customer_reviews.author: rcg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful easy assembly Customer service awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this furniture it literally took maybe 20 minutes to put together. The only problem I had was one of the arms is cracked. The seller contacted me almost immediately and they are sending a replacement! I am so happy with this product it’s beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Simon

customer_reviews.title: Good price.
customer_reviews.text: They faded quickly in the sun, not unexpected. I plan on throwing a coat of poly on them at some point. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Curt D

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: The pair of chairs arrived October-4-2019 (Estimated Delivery Date: October 3, 2019 - October 8, 2019) .the package was in good condition, the chair assembly and the instructions were easy to follow and the chairs are very comfortable nice firm cushions over all happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Barry M.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and great looking.
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase. We purchased two sets of two and one of the chairs had damage to one side. The seller immediately replaced the chair. They are very comfortable and well made. I also purchased the matching coffee table and the whole set looks fantastic on our deck.
customer_reviews.author: shana1

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice Chat Set but the back sit up a little too straight.
customer_reviews.author: mariaa33

customer_reviews.title: ... these chairs because of their price but I am glad I bought them
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant on buying these chairs because of their price but I am glad I bought them. They are very pretty and seem to be good quality. They arrived well packaged and in perfect condition. I loved them so much that I bought four more for my deck. I also got the decorative pillows and teak table from Amazon. Great experience buying my outdoor furniture from here. I highly recommend these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: VeroG

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured, well built. I was worried this would feel really "Cheap" because of the price. But so far we love it! It feels very sturdy and not to mention it's beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Dan K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. Heavy construction and sturdy. Seat is deep and very comfortable. Just love them.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Linn

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my patio they are so comfortable and very sturdy. Also they are very nice looking. If I ever buy a house I would definitely buy another set to put on my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jean Parry

customer_reviews.title: Stain after first rain
customer_reviews.text: I just recently purchased a set of these chairs and after the first rain one of the cushions is stained and one is not. What gives?
customer_reviews.author: Rafael E DeLeon

customer_reviews.title: Solid Construction
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. Real wood. Easy to assemble. Looks great. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love the aesthetic. Firm cushions and nice wood. Kind of wish I went with the red though cause my toddler got the white cushions dirty and they don’t wash that easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy chairs
customer_reviews.text: At first the giant box and assembly instructions were daunting, but I am actually really pleased with this chair. It wasn't that hard to put together. By the second one it was a breeze. The chairs are gigantic and really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Looks high end. Easy to put together. Each chair took about 15 minutes. Exactly as pictured, nice and large.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bjorkman

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Great look for the price. Very comfortable. Dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs!
customer_reviews.text: I love these modern-looking chairs! They are a bit firm, but they are great quality and add a nice touch to any porch or balcony!
customer_reviews.author: Halley Nagy

product_meta.title: Christopher Knight Home GDF Studio 299099 Preston Outdoor Wooden Club Chairs w/Blue Cushions (Set of 2)
product_meta.description: This deep seated set of chairs is great for any back yard. With their acacia wood frame, these chairs are sturdy; perfect for continued outdoor use. The thick cushions help provide continued and long lasting comfort, so you can spend all day outside. The cushions water resistant covering also help provide an easy to clean surface for all of life’s little messes.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 32.50 inches deep x 28.00 inches wide x 31.25 inches high Seat Width: 22.75 inches Seat Depth: 23.25 inches Seat Height: 16.75 inches Arm Height: 22.53

This deep seated set of chairs is great for any back yard. With their acacia wood frame, these chairs are sturdy; perfect for continued outdoor use. The thick cushions help provide continued and long lasting comfort, so you can spend all day outside. The cushions water resistant covering also help provide an easy to clean surface for all of life’s little messes.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 5.0 out of 5 stars4 ratings5.0 out of 5 stars
